title: The Best Street Style From Paris Fashion Week
text:
After New York, London, and Milan, Fashion Month is coming to a close in the city of lights, wine, romance, and the best clothes: Paris. And with brands like Dior, Saint Laurent, and Margiela showing, the street style was top-notch.

If your eyes need a break from the barrage of color in the other cities, take a look at the Parisians in their toned-down hues. We saw lots of cool headgear — like the beaded headpieces in the image above — and a surprising number of outfits that referenced bondage. One stylish lady wore a leather peplum corset over a trench, and two others threw corsets over pink dresses. Black leather cross-bodies with thick hardware elements acted like harnesses, and combat boots made outfits much more tough.

Our street-style photographer Nicky Zeng is following the European fashion all month. Below, scroll to see the best looks from Paris Fashion Week.
description: Nicky Zeng photographs the coolest, wildest, and most stylish looks at Paris Fashion Week spring 2020 for the Cut.
